name: The Shoemaker (KOCHALOCH)
description:
Hello, This is my entry for the Brackeys Jam 2022_2

STORY

Some might know the story of the shoemaker and the elves but few know its true origins....

A shoe makers worst nightmare was to wake up to visiting elves in the night. You see these elves did not come to help make shoes but to consume them and unhappy hungry elves just might turn to the next best thing.......


GUIDE

  • To survive the night one needs to keep building shoes and keep the lights on. This will keep the elves at bay.
  • Keep an eye out for traps and elves as they grow more agitated.
  • Make sure to stay out of the dark.

CONTROLS
